title: China threatens to nuke Japan over Taiwan in video played on CCP-sanctioned channel
content:
1. China threatens to nuke Japan over Taiwan in video played on CCP-sanctioned channel  Fox News
  2. Taiwan to open representative office in China sceptic Lithuania  Reuters
  3. US military aircraft landing on Taiwan a provocation, must not become routine: experts  Global Times

localize.title: 中国共産党が運営するチャンネルで、台湾問題で日本への核攻撃を予告するビデオが放映される
中国在中共认可的频道上播放的视频中威胁要在台湾问题上对日本进行核打击
中國在中共認可的頻道上播放的視頻中威脅要在臺灣問題上對日本進行核打擊
